overview: On World Comedy Unplugged 3, some of the best comedians from Australia and overseas will have you rolling around in stitches with just under 2 hours of non-stop laughter.  Representing the UK are the incredible Jeff Green, Lee Mack and John Moloney. While the Irish sent over their best talent in Ardal O'Hanlon and Tommy Tiernan.  Included are the cream of the crop in US comedy in Maria Bamford, Lewis Black, Lenny Clarke, Adam Ferrara and Sabrina Matthews. And you will be highly entertained by Canada's Jason John Whitehead and Jeremy Hotz.  Prepare for one of the greatest television events of the year..this is World Comedy Unplugged 2003.
title: World Comedy Unplugged 2003
